title: SHOW ENDPOINTS command: New column and changes to output | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The SHOW ENDPOINTS command behaves as follows:
In commands output, the port column always has a value.
The output includes a new port_range column that appears  immediately after the port column.
If port is null, contains a port range in the form ####-####.
If the port_range column is NOT NULL, the port column is NULL.
